txt.en:
[placeholder],

It has been many years since I last heard tell of a Mariner of your skill, but even the most seasoned of us can be made a fool by the Sea. If you wish to learn the finer techniques of the Mariner, come and speak with me in the Dwarrow-ward of Bree-town.

Mick Maidenhair

'Yes? Ah, my letter. It is good to meet you at last, [placeholder]!

'It is true enough that many lessons can be only learned upon the deck of a ship, but even so, there is much to be gained by studying the accounts of the great Mariners of the world with your feet firmly planted on the ground! I have several books in my keeping that might be of use to a Mariner such as yourself. Perhaps they will help you, as they have helped me over the years. If you wish to study them further, I'll offer them to you for a fair price.

'You might need the knowledge they contain when you least expect it!'
You received a letter from Mick Maidenhair, a seasoned Mariner of Bree-town.
Bring the letter to Mick Maidenhair in the Dwarrow-ward, in Bree-town
Mick Maidenhair sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in the Dwarrow-ward, in Bree-town.\n\nDeliver the letter to Mick Maidenhair. He can be found in the Dwarrow-ward, in Bree-town.
